sentences.en: Doubling of chromosomes improved the meiosis obviously, but tetraploid hybrid was still acarpous which may be related to the nucleo-cytoplasmic incompatibility.
sentences.cn: 染色体加倍明显改善了杂种的减数分裂，但杂种四倍体仍不能结实，推测杂种的不育性很可能与核质亲和性有关。

sentences.en: He cut down those acarpous plant.
sentences.cn: 他砍掉那些不结果实的植物。

sentences.en: In addition, the enzyme activity of high yield female plant, low yield female plant and acarpous female plant were compared.
sentences.cn: 此外，还比较了高产、低产、不结果雌株之间同工酶的酶带和活性差别。

sentences.en: In addition, the isozyme bands and enzyme activity of high yield female plant, low yield female plant and acarpous female plant were compared.
sentences.cn: 此外，还比较了高产、低产、不结果雌株之间同工酶的酶带和活性差别。

sentences.en: The abysmal academician's acarpous writing had accomplished little in achievements to date.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，那位深不可测的院士的没有结果的著作仅仅完成了极少数部分。
